label: 屏風花氈等帳
対訳語: Record of Folding Screens, Patterned Rugs, etc.
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
見出し読み: びょうぶかせんとうちょう
説明文: One of the records included in the Tōdai-ji kemmotsu chō  (Dedicatory Records of Tōdai-ji) of donations to Tōdai-ji by Empress Kōmyō in honor of her deceased husband Emperor Shōmu. It is dated 26 July 756. See also Tōdai-ji kemmotsu chō. [東大寺献物帳、光明皇后、聖武天皇]
